about.desc: Founded with a passion for authenticity, Unique T Fabric bridges the gap between traditional Indian artistry and modern fashion demands. Our journey began in the heart of Pune.
about.desc2: We believe that every fabric tells a story. From the handpicked cotton of the Deccan to the shimmering silks of Banaras, our collection is a tribute to the weavers who have kept this art alive for centuries. When you choose Unique T, you are not just buying cloth; you are embracing a legacy of elegance and culture.

policies.title: Legal Policies Overview
policies.content:
At Unique T Fabric, we are committed to operating with complete transparency and integrity. Our legal policies are designed to protect both our customers and our brand.

Compliance

We adhere to all applicable Indian laws regarding e-commerce, consumer protection, and textile trade.

Ethical Standards

We strictly prohibit the use of child labor and ensure fair wages for all artisans involved in our supply chain.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.content:
Welcome to Unique T Fabric. By accessing our website and app, you agree to the following terms:

  • Usage: Our platform is for personal, non-commercial use only.
  • Account: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
  • Pricing: Prices are subject to change without notice, but we honor the price at the time of purchase.
  • Intellectual Property: All designs, images, and content are the property of Unique T Fabric.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Your privacy is paramount. We collect only necessary data to improve your shopping experience.

Data Collection

We collect name, address, and contact details for order processing. Payment details are processed securely via third-party gateways (e.g., Razorpay, Stripe).

Cookies

We use cookies to remember your preferences and cart items.

Data Sharing

We do NOT sell your data to third parties.

refund.title: Refund & Cancellation Policy
refund.content:
We want you to love your purchase. If not, we're here to help.

  • Returns: You may return items within 7 days of delivery if they are unused and unwashed.
  • Refunds: Processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item.
  • Cancellations: Orders can be cancelled before they are shipped for a full refund.
  • Defects: In case of manufacturing defects, we offer a free replacement or full refund.

license.title: License & Agreement
license.content:
By purchasing from Unique T Fabric, you are granted a license to use the products for personal use.

Resale

Resale of our branded products on other platforms (Amazon, Flipkart, etc.) without written authorization is prohibited.

Brand Assets

You may not use our logo or brand imagery for commercial purposes without permission.
